history.caption: execute macro: Make_Yagi_directors
code: Dim L_directors(40) As Variant, S_directors(40) As Variant

history.caption: execute macro: Parametric FarField Request
code: ' safety against rounding errors for upper limit (tiny increase of cst_ffhigh)
For cst_ffrq=cst_fflow To cst_ffhigh STEP cst_ffstep
